channel.title: Once person can use starter a lil help needed
channel.description:
All right
i wanted to add this code into every file into the moreinfo folder but, i want to make it so when a new player logs in it would add it automaticly and the files all ready in there here's the code
[code]character-kitstarter = 0[/code]
it was in my other server whitch made it so only 1 starter per acc but ints not in my new one

item.title: Once person can use starter a lil help needed
item.dc:creator: @krandolv krandolv
item.description:
@krandolv wrote:

I think you add to player.java search for some of the int’s that are in your character files now to locate it

Read full topic
item.source: Once person can use starter a lil help needed
